messages.title: Time for Positive Politics
messages.content: On Thursday, May 7th, you have three votes: two for your local Green candidates, and one for MARTIN DOBSON, your Green MP candidate.

messages.title: The Green Surge can end the austerity cuts of the big three
messages.content: Martin is standing on a platform of policies for the common good.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: End austerity, Give the NHS the funding it needs.
A Living Wage for all, End zero-hours contracts, No tax on minimum wage.
Say NO to fracking, Say YES to renewable energy.
Free Education and bring Academies and Free Schools into local authority control.
Bring our NHS back into public control, End privatisation.
Fair votes for all, End safe seats.
Bring our railways back into public control.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour, Liberal Democrat and Conservative candidates

issues.economy: A Living Wage for all, End zero-hours contracts, No tax on minimum wage.
issues.education: Free Education and bring Academies and Free Schools into local authority control.
issues.environment: Say NO to fracking, Say YES to renewable energy.
issues.governance: Fair votes for all, End safe seats.
issues.health: Give the NHS the funding it needs. Bring our NHS back into public control, End privatisation.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Green for the common good.
